answers.answer: hi,relax,neuropathy simply means inflammation or some disorder of nerves which leads to symptoms like muscle weakness,tingling,burning etc.Causes are vitamin deficiency,diabetes,low calcium levels,side effects of drugs etc.Some autoimmune disorders which run in families are associated with neuropathy.HIV is just one of the cause.
